item.title: Logger for Useful Logs
item.description: ```swift func DEBUG_LOG(_ msg: Any, file: String = #file, function: String = #function, line: Int = #line) { let filename = file.split(separator: ‚Äú/‚Äù).last ?? ‚Äú‚Äù let funcName = function.split(separator: ‚Äú(‚Äú).first ?? ‚Äú‚Äù print(‚Äúüëª [(filename)] (funcName)((line)): (msg)‚Äù) }
